description: Dive into "Enchanting Castles of Pompeii's Past" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Enchanting Castles of Pompeii's Past

places.generalDescription: Welcome to Bonjours Groupe Présence 30 - Villeneuve les Avignon, a remarkable establishment that embodies the charm of the Gard region. This enchanting castle, constructed in 1860 atop a rocky outcrop, offers stunning panoramic views across five departments. The architectural beauty is complemented by its inviting interiors, featuring a cozy living room with a fireplace, an equipped kitchen also adorned with a fireplace, and an elegant dining area.

sources.snippet: Discover this exceptional castle, built in 1860 on a rocky outcrop, offering a breathtaking panoramic view across five departments. Nestled in the heart of a charming village in the Gard region, this château is a true architectural gem, a testament to the region's history. On the ground floor, enjoy a living room with a fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen also featuring a fireplace, a dining room, a reception lounge, as well as a North-East tower, adding a prestigious touch to this home.
sources.shortName: Castle for Sale in Avignon: Castle Real Estate

places.name: Bonjours Groupe Présence 30 - Villeneuve les Avignon

reviews.text:
(Translated by Google) The staff is very attentive!
Welcoming, polite and friendly.

(Original)
Le personnel aux petits oignons !
Accueillant, Poli et sympathique.

(Translated by Google) Very good collaboration, healthy and constructive, we regularly receive beneficiaries referred by them. We will not hesitate to do the same as soon as we no longer have space in our home help services.
Let's stick together between those involved in home support in the Gard Rhone region!

(Original)
Très bonne collaboration, saine et constructive, nous recevons régulièrement des bénéficiaires orientés par leurs soins. Nous n'hésiterons pas à faire de même dès que nous n'aurons plus de place dans nos services d'aides à domicile.
Serrons nous les coudes entre acteurs du maintien à domicile du gard rhodanien!

(Translated by Google) Wonderful welcome. There is a real climate of kindness.

(Original)
Accueil formidable. Il règne un véritable climat de bienveillance.

places.address: 5 bis Rue du Camp de Bataille, 30400 Villeneuve-lès-Avignon, France
